model

Interface StoreModelClientHandler

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    StoreModel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Store

    public interface StoreModelClientHandler
    StoreModelClientHandler defines the interface handling all actions handed to client package connecting to the server
    Version:
    (Version 1.0, 06/04/2019)
    Author:
    Group 1

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods
